description: Configuration for Recursive UMAP + HDBSCAN clustering on high-dimensional embeddings (Spotify Engineering approach)
comment: Recursive UMAP + HDBSCAN on HIGH-DIMENSIONAL embeddings. At each level: (1) Apply UMAP to reduce high-dim â†’ 2D, (2) Apply HDBSCAN on 2D to find clusters, (3) For each cluster, extract high-dim subset and recurse. Features use SAE decoder weights from HuggingFace (orthogonal features with cosine similarity < 0.25). Explanations use embeddings from data/embeddings/ directory (higher internal similarity).
